_header: Sweet rose of virtue and of gentleness
_description: William Dunbar, ‘To a ladye’ — three 5-line stanzas

CamMagPep2553.First Lines:
Sweit rois of vertew and of gentilnesDelytsum lyllie of everie
                    lustynes…
CamMagPep2553.Last Lines:
…That I wald mak to plant his rute aganeSo confortand his
                    levis vnto me bene
